NF.Q: In the column Distribution Channels of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 5052? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
Between which pairs of nodes in column Distribution Channels and column Food Sources is the flow between 1112 and 2770? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1135} from node {Wholesalers} to {Orchards}, a flow of {2325} from node {Online Platforms} to {Orchards}, a flow of {1284} from node {Online Platforms} to {Greenhouses}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 1731 and 1940? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1796} from node {Greenhouses} to {Food Banks}.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Farms to node Food Banks and from node Online Platforms to node Greenhouses, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Online Platforms} to node {Greenhouses} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Farms to node Food Banks and from node Online Platforms to node Ranches, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Online Platforms} to node {Ranches} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Farmers' Markets to node Fisheries, from node Farmers' Markets to node Orchards, and from node Online Platforms to node Fisheries, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Farmers' Markets} to node {Orchards} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Waste Management of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Waste Management is {Food Banks}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Farmers' Markets to target node Landfills? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Farmers' Markets to node Landfills is: {Farmers' Markets, Orchards, Landfills}.
